name: DND
summary: DND is the seminal mainframe classic, which started computer role-playing games. The name of the game clearly comes from the Dungeons and Dragons (D&D) pen and paper role playing systems, and it uses D&D rules. Further inspired by Pedit5, the game itself is a classic dungeon crawl. It could be counted as a "rogue-like" but doesn't have random dungeons.

name: Dnieper River Line
summary: The Dnieper River Line is a fictionalized engagement between German and Russian forces in the Southern Ukraine in late 1943. As the Germans you are challenged to repel Russian efforts to breach your critical defensive position. The Soviet units controlled by the computer seek to over run your thin German defensive line and capture sufficient objectives to assure victory. Dnieper River Line is a computer game which is played out board game style with a 8" x 11" mapboard and 240 5/8" illustrated counters.

name: D.N.Age
summary: ‘D.N.Age’ features a DNA system that will open your eyes to a new, never-before-seen world of monster merging. Improve the DNA of your monsters to create stronger specimens and form a party to complete quests!

name: DNO Rasa's Journey
summary: Guide Rasa on her journey as she collects lost DNA, and breathes life back into the broken planet. DNO is a continuous side-scrolling platformer that shows remnants of the once great planet Lira. Unlock creatures that once dwelled here, through the use of a unique card collection system, and use power-ups to make your way through each level. The seed awakens, and an entirely new landscape lies before it... ...How will you choose to recreate the world?

name: D.N.A.: Dark Native Apostle
summary: 3D action adventure game for the PS2, inspired by Bomberman and heavily influenced by comic books

name: DNA Warrior
summary: A horizontally side-scrolling shoot-em-up.

name: D.N. Angel: Crimson Wings
summary: Kurenai no Tsubasa (紅の翼) is based on D.N. Angel manga and anime and game's release coincides with the airing of the last episode of the anime TV series. In the game the player controls Daisuke Niwa, the protagonist of the series, who has inherited the ability, through family bloodline, to turn into a phantom thief. While the game features various CG events and typical visual novel character dialogue screens, core gameplay is done in 3rd-person isometric perspective where the player directly controls the protagonist. Voice-acting was done by the same actors from the anime TV series.

name: DNA
summary: DNA is a top down shooter mixing: combat, survival and exploration in an apocalyptic open world with pixel art and minimalist design.

name: Dnce Prty
summary:
Dnce Prty is a party dance simulator: move your ragdoll in a completely interactive environment!

Select your favourite track and move your character to the rhythm of music, hitting the circles that appear on screen with the specified limb. You can compete against a friend, the CPU or just play by yourself... Dance is the watchword!

name: DNA Farm
summary: Hardcore adventure inside the human body. You take control of one bacteriophage, which steals(farms) DNA resources from various viruses. Use this DNA to evolve or create clones with which you can change positions at any time. Used wisely, you may cure all 5 organs.

name: DNF Duel
summary:
DNF Duel is a fast-paced 2.5D fighting game set in the Dungeon & Fighter universe. Players select from a diverse roster of iconic fighters, each with distinct combat styles, signature skills, and strategic toolsets.

The game combines fluid controls with deep tactical systems, including an MP gauge for powerful abilities and dynamic "Awakening" states that can turn the tide of battle. Vibrant stages, eye-catching visuals, and expressive animations bring every clash to life.

With multiple modes — such as Story, Arcade, Survival, Ranked Online, and local versus — DNF Duel caters to both solo players and competitive fighters, offering accessible entry points as well as layers of depth for seasoned players.

name: DnD Adventure: Wizard's Choice
summary: RPG interactive novels that will engross you in a story while allowing you to make the decisions that will determine your fate.

name: DNAxCat
summary: In the virtual adventure world of DNAxCat, players can raise and breed a variety of cute meow warriors and fight side by side with them. And players can get more rewards through daily missions, PVE, and PVP systems in the game. At the same time, DNAxCat is also an economy in which ownership is totally decided by players, allowing players to seamlessly sell and trade their game assets into Token. DNAxCat wants to lead the trend of GameFi and “Play To Earn”, allowing players to earn by playing games.

name: DnD Adventure: Rogue's Choice
summary: With debts to pay to the underworld, you need to make a lot of coin fast! Perhaps worse, you're wanted by the King's men for desertion. Survival is your first priority...

name: DNF Duel: Who's Next
summary:
The Nintendo Switch version of DNF Duel uses delay-based netcode instead of the rollback netcode used in the original releases. None of the releases currently support crossplay.

Action fighting at its extreme! One of the most popular and widely played RPGs in the world, Dungeon and Fighter is now back as a 2.5D action fighting game. Choose from 16 charming characters, each with their distinct skills and personalities. Outsmart, outplay, or downright beat up your opponents and become the master of the Ultimate Will!

name: DNF Duel: DLC 1 - Spectre
summary:
'Spectre' can be used in DNF Duel.

Spectre is the first character in the DNF Duel: Season Pass and was released alongside a major balance patch and gameplay update that added new systems to the game.

name: DNF Duel: Season Pass
summary:
The Season Pass for DNF Duel is set to have 5 characters released by the end of 2024, each character will also be available separately.

The characters included are Spectre, Brawler, Battle Mage, Monk and a 5th to be revealed later.

name: DNF Duel: DLC 2 - Brawler
summary: 'Brawler' can be used in DNF Duel.

name: DNF Duel: DLC 3 - Battle Mage
summary: 'Battle Mage' can be used in DNF Duel.

name: DN64 Revisited
summary: 3 Duke Nukem 64 Exclusive DM maps morphed into a SP Episode Experience

name: DNA: Episode 1
summary: DNA is an episodic retro, story-driven 2D side scrolling beat em' up that welcomes the world into the DNA universe in a highly interactive anime where the player completes side scrolling segments while progressing through engaging animations depicting the fascinating origins story of DNA.

name: DNF Duel: DLC 4 - Monk
summary: 'Monk' can be used in DNF Duel.

name: DNF Duel: DLC 5 - Nen Master
summary: Nen Master is the 5th DLC character for DNF Duel and final character in the game's Season Pass,

name: DNA: Episode 3
summary: The DNA action rpg franchise is created by a solo dev as an episodic side scrolling action hack and slash beat em up, story-driven 2d anime that welcomes the world into the DNA universe. You play as the main character Leo to find his true purpose in life. Thus begins the fascinating story of DNA!

name: DNA: Episode 2
summary: The DNA action rpg franchise is created by a solo dev as an episodic side scrolling action hack and slash beat em up, story-driven 2d anime that welcomes the world into the DNA universe. You play as the main character Leo to find his true purpose in life. Thus begins the fascinating story of DNA!

name: DNA Subject: Lucy
summary: DNA Subject: Lucy is a Yume Nikki fangame where you explore the dreams of Lucy, a young girl who isolates herself from the rest of the world. An entry for Dream Diary Jam 8.

name: DNA: Season 2 - Episode 1
summary: The DNA action rpg franchise is created by a solo dev as an episodic side scrolling action hack and slash beat em up, story-driven 2d anime that welcomes the world into the DNA universe. You play as the main character Leo to find his true purpose in life. Thus begins the fascinating story of DNA!

name: D.N.A: Do Not Answer
summary: D.N.A is a short first-person, story-driven horror game developed by a small independent studio. Players navigate an eerie, abandoned hospital, uncover clues, manage limited light sources, and face a dark presence. Featuring multiple endings, realistic graphics, and immersive sound design.

name: DNetHack
summary: dNetHack is a NetHack variant based on NetHack 3.4.3. The name stands for Dungeons and Extra-Terrestrials Hack (DnET-Hack).

name: DnB Starfighter
summary: High-speed shmup where survival meets rhythm. Evade waves of enemies to pounding drum and bass soundtrack. Customize your ship, perfect your run, and claim your spot on the leaderboards.
